response.overview: An un-conventional(?) journey through the quieter, everyday streets of London, far from typical tourist spots, on a double-decker bus. This video blends personal and public reflections inspired by Peruvian writers(?), offering philosophical insights that connect London's corners (lol) with cultural legacies from Peru (omg).  June 22: #FlavioVelasquez  June 11: #FelipePardoyAliaga  June 14: #JoseCarlosMariategui  June 23: #ManuelAscencioSegura  June 30: #AuroraColinaPareja
response.title: I love cemeteries or silent celebrations
